Health: 100% Health
Power Gain: Increase all Power Gain by 100%.
Strike Back: When damaged by a Special Attack, this enemy gains 1 bar of Power.

Champion Boost: 100% Attack & Health
Infinity Blast: Blasts a portion of remaining Health. Effectiveness changes to match the Class Relationship of both Champions.

Martial Mastery: Every 6 hits inflict Stun
Pessimist: Gains Fury, Armor up, and Health Steal as long as they remain above 75% HP.
All or Nothing: This Champion stores Power until its third Special Attack is ready

Health: 100% Health
Optimist: Gains Fury, Armor Up, and Health Steal as long as they remain below 25% HP.

Power Start 1: Start with 1 bar of Power.

Health: 100% Health
Thorns: Retaliates with 15% Attack as Physical Damage whenever struck by an Attack that makes contact.

Health: 200% Health
Fissure: Each of the Defender's attacks tear and rupture the Attacker's Armor, inflicting a stacking 1% Armor Break
Heal Block: Prevent the Attacker from recovering Health.

Champion Boost: 300% Attack & Health
Health: 200% Health
Limber: Each time the Defender receives a Stun Debuff, they reduce the Duration of further Stun Debuffs by 0.10 seconds.
Unblockable Finale: Attacks are unblockable as long as Health remains below 25%.
Poison: Inflicts Poison, draining 100% Health over 30 seconds.

Biohazard: When struck, 20% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 100% of the Attack as direct damage over 7.50 seconds. When Blocking an attack, 50% chance to inflict Poison, dealing 100% of the Attack as direct damage over 7.50 seconds.
